channel.title: Home on dyeislife.dk
channel.description: Recent content in Home on dyeislife.dk

item.title: About us
item.description: The crew Karl Managing Dyerector Karl is probably the most consistent player to exist. His table hit rate comes in on 97%. This is what a semester in the USA with every day Dyeing does with you. He is also the only one from us who had to do a naked run (There is a video online). Hans Dyeligence Consultant Fifa a controversial part of the game is defended by Hans rigorously.

item.title: Rules
item.description: Disclaimer Beer die (Dye) can – like many other beer games – be played in thousands of different variations. The following are the preferred rules of the team behind dyeislife.dk, which we recommend everyone to follow. Dye Up! How to play in video The Set-Up To play Beer Die (also referred to as dye), you will need a 4’ by 8’ (feet) plywood table with a dividing line going through the middle (vertically).

item.title: Shop
item.description: T-Shirt The missing piece in your wardrope: The dyeislifedk shirt. It is essential for every Dyer and poser. 250 DKK Buy now Stickers The stickers. Go out and spread the word of Dye, plaster it over your favorite public toilet. Please don't do this–it's vandalism. 50 DKK Buy now Hat What a hat.

item.title: Sign up
item.description: Sign up form After a huge success of the first Dye tournament in 2020 we are back to bring you another Dye tournament: bigger, better, and more Dye! Register your team below! The signup price for the tournament is 60 kr. After you have signed up we will send you an email with instructions to pay. The tournament will take place at Tietgenkollegiet on the 14th of August 2021. Everyone can join.
